Receivable_Writeoff_ReasonObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Receivable_Writeoff_ReasonObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Receivable_Writeoff_ReasonObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Charges_for_Writeoffs_Data.description: The writeoff reason to apply to a set of charges.

Student_ChargeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_ChargeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_ChargeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Charges_for_Writeoffs_Data.description: The charges to create writeoffs for.

description: Given a list of student charges and a writeoff reason, create charge writeoffs.

validation.validation: Specify a Student Financials Writeoff Reason. To add specific reasons, access the Maintain Receivables Writeoff Reason task.
To write off, specify an initial charge that isn't pending, in progress, fully paid, or already written off. These charges can't be written off: [list of reference IDs]
